description:
Preßburg was an officer in the Imperial fleet, and the heir of a noble family. By 788 UC he had been captured in battle and placed in the Alliance`s Econia Internment Camp. There, he cooperated with Alliance Captain Barnaby Costea to stage a prison riot, with Costea promising to have Preßburg and his men returned to their homes in the Empire within three months.
Gineipedia
name: Pressburg
